summary: GrantFlow platform comprehensive testing of 3 new features completed: RBAC, Email verification/password reset, and OCR pipeline. Backend APIs 100% functional (30/30 tests passed). Frontend pages load correctly with proper UI elements. OCR is MOCKED with realistic extracted fields and confidence scores. RBAC enforces owner/imputernicit/consultant permissions correctly. Email verification uses token-based approach (no real email sending).

integration_issues.issue: Direct navigation to protected pages redirects to login (expected behavior)

passed_tests: RBAC: User registration creates users without org membership initially
RBAC: Owner can create organization (becomes owner automatically)
RBAC: Owner can add members as imputernicit with different permissions
RBAC: Imputernicit has limited access (cannot manage members)
RBAC: Owner can create projects, imputernicit can view projects
RBAC: Project transitions only allowed for owners
Email Verification: Registration returns verification_token
Email Verification: POST /api/auth/verify-email endpoint works
Email Verification: POST /api/auth/resend-verification endpoint works
Email Verification: Login returns email_verified field
Password Reset: POST /api/auth/reset-password returns reset_token
Password Reset: POST /api/auth/reset-password/confirm works with token
Password Reset: Login with new password works after reset
Password Reset: POST /api/auth/change-password works with current password
OCR: POST /api/documents/{id}/ocr triggers OCR processing (MOCKED)
OCR: GET /api/documents/{id}/ocr returns extracted fields with confidence scores
OCR: POST /api/documents/{id}/ocr/correct corrects OCR fields
OCR: Realistic mock data with confidence scores for different document types
Frontend: Login page has 'Ai uitat parola?' link
Frontend: /reset-password page loads with proper form structure
Frontend: /verify-email page loads correctly
Frontend: Registration page has proper form validation
Frontend: Password reset navigation from login page works
Frontend: Authentication redirects work correctly for protected routes
Backend: All existing features continue to work (organizations, projects, documents)
Backend: Admin dashboard and audit logging functional
Backend: MOCKED external APIs (ONRC, ANAF, OCR) working correctly
Integration: Backend-frontend routing configured properly
Integration: REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL configuration working
Integration: All API endpoints respond correctly to frontend calls
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (30/30), Frontend: 85% (auth-protected pages require login flow)
